markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Akiton the Red](/Articles.aspx?ID=51)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 68</row>

The fourth planet from Golarion's sun is a red-tinged desert world. Learn about the people and technology of this planet and its rough-and-tumble city of Seldo.
name: Akiton the Red
